item.title: How I made this blog
item.description: Github Create a new Github repository (or Github pages repo by naming it username.github.io) Check “Initialize this repository with a README” Add a license Clone your repo to your home dir: cd git clone https://github.com/martinry/martinry.github.io.git cd martinry.github.io Install Hugo Mac: brew install hugo Linux: sudo apt-get install hugo Create a new Hugo project # New project hugo new site ./ --force # --force to write to existing dir # Add a theme git submodule add https://github.

item.title: Ulam spiral in R
item.description: spiral <- function(N){ # Area size area <- matrix(1, N, N) # Find middle for x and y coordinates y <- ceiling(N/2) x <- ceiling(N/2) # Direction vector with starting iterations d <- c(1, # right 1, # down 2, # left 2) # up # Sequence of directional indices s <- rep(seq(1:4), N**2/4) i = 1 # iterator from 1:NN j = 0 # iterator to keep track of current direction b = F # Initialize break as false # Loop until N^2 is reached while(i <= N**2){ # Break if goofed if(is.
